system.description: These creatures are thought to originally be from another world. Now a rarely seen species, these people are sturdy and aren't the brightest as they never know when to leave.
system.appearance: Baroosh look like halflings with a dwarf's build and a pig-like nose.

overview.base: You climb at half speed.
overview.proficient: You instead climb at normal speed.

overview.base: You are immune to fall damage.
